Text:
...classic 80s' album cover.  Must have taken minutes to capture just the right pose with the flashlight!  :)

Thank you for this!!!!
I agree that cover screams 80s! As always thank you

B1 Things That I Fear is missing from the torrent.
JettBlack9/alan

THANKS FOR THIS AND THE OTHERS!

Thanks again for all the great posts, discovering some real gems here. 80s was such and enjoyable decade for music.....what makes for a treasure is that it is hidden in obscurity.

Please people check out my torrent by an icelandic 80s group called *Bara Flokkurinn* before it dies. Marvelous synthpop there.

Thank you very much!!!!!!!
After a search of years i finally found the album here. I was forgotten the name of the album and the artist but a  search to the song dream boy led me to this album here. You have made me happy!!
I will going to look for your other uploads.
Track B1 Things That I Fear seems to be missing from my torrent.  Has anyone else noticed this?
